page.title: 19Social Concerns Helford
page.content:
The Elderly _ Voluntary transport schemes for the elderly to the Health Centre, visiting or shopping, by Age Concern and District Council funding. Meals on Wheels and Home Helps are available on medical recommendation.
Community nursing available to those who require care at home.
Aids are provided for the elderly and disabled, such as walking frames, bath seats, toilet frames, stair hand rails.
Disabilities _ mainly heart and lung diseases, arthritis, hiatus hernia. carcinoma, and diabetes. Occasional road farm and boating accidents.
